jedi:tentaclejuice.NAME: Tentacle Juice
DESCRIPTIONS: Constricted creatures take damage after their turn.

jedi:hoardpotion.NAME: Hoard Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add all cards from current card select screen to your deck.
Upgrade all cards from current card select screen and add them to your deck.

jedi:mysterypotion.NAME: Mystery Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next room you can go to, other than bosses, becomes a #y? room. NL Cannot be used in #yThe #yEnding.

jedi:StrikingPotion.NAME: Striking Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 of #b3 random cards containing "Strike" to add to your hand, it costs #b0 this turn.
Choose #b1 of #b3 random cards containing "Strike" and add #b%d copies to your hand, they cost #b0 this turn.

jedi:wingpotion.NAME: Energy drink
DESCRIPTIONS: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to once.
